CustomField.description: Formula field that shows text based on Video Visit Consent or Phone Visit Consent being true
CustomField.formula: IF( TUC_Video_Visit_Consent__c , "Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth. Patient's verbal consent obtained. Confirmed Patient's Location and Phone. Environment surveyed and all participants identified. Virtual conference room locked.", IF( TUC_Phone_Visit_Consent__c , "Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth. Patient's verbal consent obtained. Confirmed Patient's Location and Phone.", "") )
CustomField.label: Telehealth Disclosure
